title: (x) Mercedes C Class UI font - Corporate S {Yves}
content:
Any ideas?

[http://www.autospies.com/article/index.asp?articleId=6235&categoryId=21](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/www.autospies.com/article/index.asp?articleId=6235&categoryId=21 "http://www.autospies.com/article/index.asp?articleId=6235&categoryId=21")

Cheers, Si

 [‹ (x) Mintz Levin logo - Adobe Garamond {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/typophile.com/node/17142 "Go to previous forum topic") ["La Gazzetta dello Sport" nameplate ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/typophile.com/node/17138 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content:
Trade Gothic Extended for AUTO SPIES

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-bold-extended/test...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-bold-extended/testdrive.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-bold-extended/testdrive.html")

Trade Gothic Bold for the navigation

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold/testdrive.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold/testdrive.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/bold/testdrive.html")
Thanks, but I was actually asking about the font used on the Merc’s LCD not the Web site’s typography.

Here’s a direct link to the LCD screen (higher res):  
 [http://www.autospies.com/images/uploads/large/0094\_0.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/www.autospies.com/images/uploads/large/0094_0.jpg "http://www.autospies.com/images/uploads/large/0094\_0.jpg")

Isn’t that simply Mercedes’ very own [Corporate S](http://web.archive.org/web/20071221221838/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=UR.121144.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=24&sampleText=After+start+0+miles+9.7+mpg&sampleSize=24)?

Cool! I think that’s it.

Thanks! Si

Fake italics - wonderful, especially in an expensive product... :-/

hhp
